welcome.title: Welcome to Blizbi!
welcome.subtitle: Joy to everyday life
welcome.description: The platform offering tailored activity suggestions based on your needs
no_events_found_date: No events found for this date and location
must_sign_in.title: Sign in to use Blizbi at max!
must_sign_in.description: Signing in unlocks all features and personalizes your experience. Please sign in to continue.
chat.welcome_subtitle: Ask about events, get instant help planning your next adventure.
chat.placeholder: What are you looking for today?
chat.clear_history_description: Are you sure you want to clear your chat history? This action cannot be undone.
bookmarked.no_bookmarks: You haven't bookmarked any events yet.
bookmarked.browse_and_bookmark: Browse events and bookmark the ones you're interested in!
interests.title: Welcome again to Blizbi! Select your interests
profile.interests.title: Select your interests
interests.description: Choose at least 5 interests to help us suggest the best events for you.
coming_soon.title: Blizbi Assistant is coming soon!
coming_soon.description: We're working hard to bring you Blizbi Assistant, a smart AI tool that will help you discover and get suggestions for events. Check back soon to see it in action!

banner.title: üîí We protect your privacy
banner.description: Blizbi uses cookies and similar technology to improve the service, personalize activity suggestions, and collect anonymous statistics. We do **not** use your data for targeted advertising, and we never share personal information with third parties.
banner.details: You decide what to share. Read more in our [privacy policy](https://www.blizbi.no/privacy).
banner.customize_description: Choose which types of cookies and data processing you're comfortable with:

panel.title: Customize your settings
panel.description: Here you can decide which types of data we can use. You can change these at any time.

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Used to ensure Blizbi works (e.g. login and security)

functional.title: Settings and preferences
functional.description: Saves your language settings, bookmarks, and other preferences for a better experience

analytics.title: Statistics and improvement
analytics.description: Helps us understand how Blizbi is used, so we can improve the experience

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Makes it possible to show you relevant activities based on your interests and usage patterns

manager.title: Privacy & Consent Management
manager.description: Manage your privacy preferences and data consent settings
manager.no_consent: No consent preferences found. Please set your preferences to continue.
manager.update_notice: ‚úì You can update or withdraw consent at any time

privacy.section_description: Control your privacy settings and manage data consent preferences
privacy.detailed_description: You have full control over your privacy. View, update, or withdraw your consent anytime.

gdpr_rights.withdraw: Withdraw all consent and delete data

withdraw_consent.title: Withdraw Consent
withdraw_consent.description: Remove all consent preferences but keep your account data. You can re-consent at any time.

delete_data.title: Delete All Data (GDPR Right to Erasure)
delete_data.description: Permanently delete all your data including profile, consent preferences, and any stored information. This action cannot be undone.
delete_data.confirm_description: This will permanently delete ALL your data including your profile, preferences, and any content you've created. This action cannot be undone.
delete_data.success_message: All your data has been successfully deleted.
delete_data.error_message: Some data could not be deleted. Please contact support.
delete_data.error_general: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
delete_data.signin_required: Must be signed in to request data deletion

in_app_settings.title: Data settings and consent
in_app_settings.description: You can change or withdraw consent at any time. We only use your data to improve the experience in Blizbi. Read more in our [privacy policy](https://www.blizbi.no/privacy).

descriptions.change_settings: Manage your privacy preferences and consent settings
descriptions.withdraw_consent: Remove all consent preferences but keep your account
descriptions.delete_data: Permanently delete all your data from Blizbi

confirmations.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.

beta_banner.title: You're Using the Beta Version.
beta_program.title: Beta Program Details
beta_program.description: You are currently accessing a beta version of this application, available only for testing within the Ryfylke region. Features may be incomplete or change without notice. Your feedback is valuable and will help us improve the service before the full launch.
bookmarked.page.title: Bookmarked Events:

search.no_popular_events: No popular events available at the moment.

search_results.error_message: Please try again or modify your search criteria.
search_results.start_typing: Start typing to search for events...
search_results.start_typing_hint: Type any keyword to see matching events appear instantly.
search_results.no_events_found: No events found matching your search criteria.
search_results.try_different: Try different keywords or modify your filters.

provider_details.no_events_found: No events found for the selected date range
provider_details.no_events_description: Try adjusting the date filter or check back later for new events.
provider_details.daily_departures: Daily departures ‚Äì click here for availability
